==Dialogue==
===Friendly Fracas===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Freminet)
:{{A|vo card freminet invite easy 01.ogg}} '''Freminet:''' Huh? You want to play cards with me? Sure, if that's what you want...
:{{DIcon|TCG}} Let's play Genius Invokation TCG.
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG match interface)
:{{DIcon}} Adjust the deck first...
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG deck interface)
:{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now...

;(When the player defeats one of Freminet's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card freminet ingame easy 02.ogg}} '''Freminet:''' I can take it...

;(When the player defeats two of Freminet's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card freminet ingame easy 03.ogg}} '''Freminet:''' Need another plan...

;(When Freminet defeats one of the player's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card freminet ingame easy 01.ogg}} '''Freminet:''' Sorry...

;(When Freminet uses an Elemental Burst)
:{{A|vo card freminet ingame easy 04.ogg}} '''Freminet:''' This one's a winner.

;(If the player wins the match)
:{{A|vo card freminet invite easy 03.ogg}} '''Freminet:''' Ah... I still couldn't win...

;(If the player loses the match)
:{{A|vo card freminet invite easy 02.ogg}} '''Freminet:''' I won... Looks like all that practice wasn't in vain...
{{Dialogue End}}

===Serious Showdown===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Freminet)
:{{A|vo card freminet invite hard 01.ogg}} '''Freminet:''' Sure. I've been practicing for some time, so this should be a good match.
:{{DIcon|TCG}} Let's play Genius Invokation TCG.
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG match interface)
:{{DIcon}} Adjust the deck first...
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG deck interface)
:{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now...

;(When the player defeats one of Freminet's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card freminet ingame hard 02.ogg}} '''Freminet:''' I was counting on that...

;(When the player defeats two of Freminet's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card freminet ingame hard 03.ogg}} '''Freminet:''' This isn't over yet...

;(When Freminet defeats one of the player's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card freminet ingame hard 01.ogg}} '''Freminet:''' Is this... how you do it?

;(When Freminet uses an Elemental Burst)
:{{A|vo card freminet ingame hard 04.ogg}} '''Freminet:''' All set.

;(If the player wins the match)
:{{A|vo card freminet invite hard 03.ogg}} '''Freminet:''' I'm sorry. I don't know if I've given you enough of a challenge...

;(If the player loses the match)
:{{A|vo card freminet invite hard 02.ogg}} '''Freminet:''' Phew... At least I managed to put everything I've learned into use.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Guest Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Freminet)
:{{A|vo card freminet freetalk 01.ogg}} '''Freminet:''' There are so many people here, and the sounds of chatter are way too loud... I wish I could don my helmet right now...
:{{DIcon|TCG}} Let's play Genius Invokation TCG.
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG challenge interface)
:{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now...
::{{A|vo card freminet leave 01.ogg}} '''Freminet:''' Are you leaving now? I'll come with you... and then spend a little time underwater, where it's nice and quiet...

;(If the player loses the match)
:{{A|vo card freminet endofgame win 01.ogg}} '''Freminet:''' Thank you for playing with me. If you ever want to play another round, just let me know.

;(If the player wins the match)
:{{A|vo card freminet endofgame fail 01.ogg}} '''Freminet:''' You're the better player after all! If you'd like to play again in the future, just say the word. I'm happy to be your opponent.
{{Dialogue End}}
